China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 1 日星期一 13:26:49 GMT 120
China Evergrande's EV share sale deal lapsesA share sale plan between China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group , the electric vehicle arm of property developer China Evergrande , and U.S.-listed NWTN has lapsed, according to a Hong Kong stock exchange filing on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 13:05:20 GMT 4K66JPFPXFPL5HAG2JDSEJMMBM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-evergrandes-ev-share-sale-deal-lapses-2024-01-01/Summer Zhen世界中国
Chinese automaker Geely raises sales target for 2024 to 1.9 mln unitsChinese carmaker Geely Automobile Holdings Ltd set its sales volume target at 1.9 million units for 2024, up 13% from its total sales last year, according to a Hong Kong stock exchange filing on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 12:28:12 GMT KEBN3TGNZBKLHCPYUPWD6CZBAU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-automaker-geely-raises-sales-target-2024-19-mln-units-2024-01-01/Summer Zhen商业汽车与交通
China's new home prices up in Dec for 4th straight month - surveyChina's new home prices rose for the fourth straight month in December, a private survey showed on Monday, buoyed by a slew of government support measures. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 10:57:27 GMT CXKTZ4WIPZM4PAXCRT2OJT5P44 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-new-home-prices-up-dec-4th-straight-month-survey-2024-01-01/Reuters世界中国
Sauber to race as Stake F1 team in 2024 and 2025Swiss-based Sauber announced on Monday they will race in Formula One as the Stake F1 team until they become the Audi factory outfit in 2026. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 09:21:59 GMT YPAWIJACRRM5RDESBP2CJCKFYU https://www.reuters.com/sports/motor-sports/sauber-race-stake-f1-team-2024-2025-2024-01-01/Reuters运动的赛车运动
Saudi sovereign wealth fund splashes cash in 2023 - report showsSaudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund accounted for about a quarter of the almost $124 billion spent by sovereign wealth funds worldwide last year, a report published on Jan. 1 showed. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 05:04:44 GMT JCLB76UCIJO7TEFKFTKTXAQSW4 https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/saudi-sovereign-wealth-fund-splashes-cash-2023-report-shows-2024-01-01/Libby George商业金融
China's Xi, US President Biden exchange congratulations on 45 years of diplomatic tiesChina's President Xi Jinping exchanged congratulations with U.S. President Joe Biden on the 45th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the two countries, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 03:24:40 GMT 5I2XUBDZIBN6DMNEODKM4RYU7A https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-us-president-biden-exchange-congratulations-45th-year-diplomatic-ties-2024-01-01/Liz Lee世界
Taiwan president says ties with China must be decided by will of the peopleTaiwan's relations with China must be decided by the will of the people and peace must be based on "dignity", President Tsai Ing-wen said on Monday after China's leader, Xi Jinping, said "reunification" with the island is inevitable. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 02:14:30 GMT UDME3OP7GVIUXFSEMKOIFN2HZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-says-ties-with-china-must-be-decided-by-will-people-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea Kim Jong Un, China's Xi exchange message vowing closer ties, Yonhap reportsNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un and Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to further develop relationship of cooperation between the two countries, in New Year messages exchanged on Monday, South Korea's Yonhap news reported citing the North's state radio. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 21:57:28 GMT GNPQ4R5W6FJWLPKQVAAE3KR7C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-kim-jong-un-chinas-xi-exchange-message-vowing-closer-ties-yonhap-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Xi says China to consolidate and enhance economic recovery in 2024President Xi Jinping said on Sunday that China will consolidate and enhance the positive trend of its economic recovery in 2024, and sustain long-term economic development with deeper reforms. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 12:31:40 GMT BYGCFZFPJBJJZHE6J755VPMHFI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/xi-says-china-consolidate-enhance-economic-recovery-2024-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
Final bodies found after China's most serious earthquake in a decadeThe bodies of the two remaining people missing in the aftermath of China's most serious earthquake in nearly a decade were found on Sunday, a tragedy that has renewed concern over exposed populations in seismically active zones. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 07:01:58 GMT JEWSD2DZINJ27A6J5ER54QENHU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/final-bodies-found-after-chinas-most-serious-earthquake-decade-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
China Dec factory contraction deepens, more stimulus on the cardsChina's manufacturing activity shrank for a third straight month in December. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 02:10:10 GMT KEGTFRN6BVKTXMHHIJQXXYBMUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-dec-factory-activity-shrinks-more-than-expected-bodes-ill-recovery-2023-12-31/Liangping Gao, Kevin Yao市场宏观问题
